DOC.detailed_description: An open-label , pilot study evaluate efficacy & safety profile SR-T100 gel treat patient VINs EGWs . Male & female old 20 year old least one VIN EGW lesion size great 5 mm diameter candidate study . The primary endpoint evaluate base patient receive 16-week treatment present evaluable measurement data end 20th week . The secondary endpoint evaluate base patient measurable value VINs EGWs , recruit patient study never experiencs associate prior SR-T100 treatment sort life time become participant study . The study plan recruit 20 patient VINs EGWs , enrollment duration last two year total 40 patient involve .
